vstore.framework.config

Class ConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.config.ConfigManager

  • public class ConfigManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads the configuration for the framework.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigManager

        private ConfigManager()
        Creates a vStoreConfig object. Reads the settings from the last configuration saved on disk.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()

      • get

        public static ConfigManager get()
        Gets the instance of the vStore config manager. To refresh / re-download the configuration, use download(boolean).
        Returns:
        The instance of the configuration manager.

      • readConfig

        private void readConfig()
        Reads the configuration from the local file.

      • download

        public void download(boolean block)
        Downloads the configuration for the framework. You can choose if this should block by setting the block parameter. a) false (background): To get notified when config download has finished, subscribe to ConfigDownloadSucceededEvent and ConfigDownloadFailedEvent. b) true (blocking): Will time out after 2 seconds of unsuccessful connection.
        Parameters:
        block - Set this to true, if the download should block.

      • isMultipleNodesAllowed

        public boolean isMultipleNodesAllowed()
        Returns:
        Returns true, if the framework is currently configured to allow the decision to decide for multiple nodes to store a file on.

      • getMatchingMode

        public Matching.MatchingMode getMatchingMode()
        Returns:
        The matching mode that is currently configured.

      • setIsMultipleNodesAllowed

        void setIsMultipleNodesAllowed(boolean multipleAllowed)
        Sets the flag to allow/disallow a decision rule to decide for storing a file on multiple storage nodes.
        Parameters:
        multipleAllowed - True, if multiple nodes should be allowed.

      • setDefaultDBThresh

        static void setDefaultDBThresh(int dbThresh)
        Sets the default dB threshold for a noise context. If the dB value of a noise context is higher than the given threshold, it will be considered as "not silent".
        Parameters:
        dbThresh - The desired threshold.

      • setMatchingMode

        public void setMatchingMode(Matching.MatchingMode mode)
        Sets the matching mode setting and stores it.
        Parameters:
        mode - The matching mode
